data.title: Good pizzas
data.text:
We all had a good time  and food here.
Pepperoni  bacon and salami pizza with a garlic butter on the crust was excellent.
The honey chicken BBQ was tasty as well.
Great  traditional chicken wings with a  flavorful sauce that you can dip in.
We all were satisfied.
One star lost due to the incompetent girl at the counter. 
Overall that was yummy.

data.title: Long wait
data.text: Ordered 4 pizzAs for a family gathering took forever and didn't bring the plain cheese  20 minutes later we were told they had to redo it because the first one was burnt another long wait. And. It finally came on the plus side all four pizzas were tasty

data.title: Massa Pan
data.text: A massa Pan é mais gostosa que a nossa, aqui no Brasil, ela é um pouco mais crua, a nossa mais seca.
